name: Minecraft Clone (Lobsternator)
description:
This is an attempt at recreating the well-known, best-seller game Minecraft and was created at my university as a solo project lasting for 4 weeks. In that time I managed to implement infinite procedural terrain generation, chunk modification/rendering and block behaviours (such as TNT exploding)!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk
  • Space - Jump
  • Double tap space - Fly
  • Shift - Run
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • Left mouse - Destroy block
  • Right mouse - Place block selected in hotbar
  • Scroll wheel/number keys - Select hotbar slot
  • F1 - Toggle chunk border rendering
